StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetDataSheetEndMonthPoolByMonth]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @OrgID int , @FiscalYear int, @TargetMonth int )
AS
BEGIN
DECLARE @BEGIN_DATE DATETIME DECLARE @END_DATE DATETIME
IF (@TargetMonth IN (10,11,12)) BEGIN SET @BEGIN_DATE = CAST(CAST(@FiscalYear - 1 AS VARCHAR(4)) + '-' + CAST(@TargetMonth AS VARCHAR(2)) + '-01' AS DATETIME) END ELSE BEGIN SET @BEGIN_DATE = CAST(CAST(@FiscalYear AS VARCHAR(4)) + '-' + CAST(@TargetMonth AS VARCHAR(2)) + '-01' AS DATETIME) END
IF (@TargetMonth = 12) BEGIN SET @END_DATE = CAST(CAST(@FiscalYear AS VARCHAR(4)) + '-01-01' AS DATETIME) END ELSE IF (@TargetMonth IN (10,11)) BEGIN SET @END_DATE = CAST(CAST(@FiscalYear -1 AS VARCHAR(4)) + '-' + CAST(@TargetMonth+1 AS VARCHAR(2)) + '-01' AS DATETIME) END ELSE BEGIN SET @END_DATE = CAST(CAST(@FiscalYear AS VARCHAR(4)) + '-' + CAST(@TargetMonth+1 AS VARCHAR(2)) + '-01' AS DATETIME) END
SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN ((mc.GENDER_CODE = 'M' AND c.COMPONENT_CODE IN ('K5','PO')) OR (c.COMPONENT_CODE = '11')) AND (MONTH(c.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE) <> MONTH(c.PROJECTED_SHIP_DATE))THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS [Rmnps_Count] ,SUM(CASE WHEN (mc.GENDER_CODE = 'F' AND c.COMPONENT_CODE IN ('K5','PO') AND (MONTH(c.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE) <> MONTH(c.PROJECTED_SHIP_DATE))) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS [Rfnps_Count] ,SUM(CASE WHEN c.COMPONENT_CODE IN ('K4','K8','K9','B5') AND (MONTH(c.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE) <> MONTH(c.PROJECTED_SHIP_DATE)) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS [Reserves_Count] ,MONTH(c.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE) AS [Month] FROM MCRISS.DBO.NWA n INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACT c ON n.NWA_ID = c.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.MARINE_CANDIDATE mc ON n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = mc.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION org ON n.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = org.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE org.ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND (c.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE >= @BEGIN_DATE AND c.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE < @END_DATE) AND (c.DISCHARGE_DATE >= @BEGIN_DATE OR c.DISCHARGE_DATE IS NULL) AND c.COMPONENT_CODE IN ('K5','PO','K4','K8','K9','B5','11') GROUP BY MONTH(c.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE)
END
